entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: E 31 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
